to hit; to strike; to break; Taiwan pr. [ji2]
ударить; бить; сломать; Тайвань пр. [ji2]

heisig_chinese_memo: To get to the other side of the mountain you need to beat the monsters, but you can't do it with your hands, so you equip your car with missiles.
Ru_trainchinese: jī: (графема) бить, ударять; атаковать, нападать на; входить в контакт с
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The mountain people always beat the other towns in the annual cornstalk contest.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " hand " to the sound of "毄", the original meaning is percussion . "Said Wen": "Sweeping. From the hand, squeaky sound." "Zhuangzi·Xiaoyaoyou": "Peng's migration to Nanmingye, the water hit three thousand miles." Han Yu "Send Meng Dongye Preface": "Jinshizhizhi Silence, or the sound of a blow, and the same goes for people to speak." Qing Dynasty Ji Yun’s "Notes from Yuewei Cottage-Guwang Listening Part 2": "There are scholars studying in the monastery, and occasionally they spin in the empty courtyard. Suddenly there are flying tiles. Its back."

" Strike " can be extended to attack and attack. "Sun Tzu‧ Imaginary Reality": "The shape of a soldier, avoiding the reality and attacking the illusion." "Historical Records of Bai Qi Wang Jian's Biographies": "Wang Jianguo's generation of Li Xin attacked Jing." Ming Dynasty Zhang Juzheng "An answer to Fang Jinhu's three guards Book>: "I use the three towns to hit it and fall back with all my strength, and it will be broken." This meaning is also seen in the scriptures, such as "Mawangdui‧ Spring and Autumn Story" line 79: "Song people are few but Jing people are all , And if it is unsuccessful, hit it and you can break it." "Mawangdui. Line 297 of the Book of Political Strategists in the Warring States Period: "Let the soldiers of the Eastern Land as Qi and Chu as the way forward. If you go out, you will die. If you hit them, you will win.

" Hit " can also be extended to touch and collide. "Zhuangzi•Tian Zifang": "If you are a wife, witnesses will keep your words, and you can't let your voice be heard." "Warring States Policy‧Qin Ceyi": "The ancients made the hub of the car drive, and the words are linked, the world is one "Historical Records: Biography of Su Qin": "The painting of the Lin Lin, the car hub hits, the shoulder rubs, the gusset forms a curtain, and the curtain forms a curtain."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " hand " to the sound of "毄", the original meaning is percussion .
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「毄」聲，本義為敲打。《說文》：「攴也。从手，毄聲。」《莊子‧逍遙遊》：「鵬之徙於南冥也，水擊三千里。」韓愈〈送孟東野序〉：「金石之無聲，或擊之鳴，人之於言也亦然。」清代紀昀《閱微草堂筆記‧姑妄聽之二》：「有士人讀書僧寺，偶便旋於空院，忽有飛瓦擊其背。」

　　「擊」可引申為攻擊、攻打。《孫子‧虛實》：「兵之形，避實而擊虛。」《史記‧白起王翦列傳》：「王翦果代李信擊荊。」明代張居正〈答方金湖計服三衛屬夷書〉：「吾以三鎮全力擊其墮歸，破之必矣。」簡帛文字也見此義，如《馬王堆‧春秋事語》第79行：「宋人寡而荊人眾，及未濟，擊之，可破也。」《馬王堆．戰國縱橫家書》第297行：「以東地之兵為齊、楚為前行，出之必死，擊其不意，萬必勝。」

　　「擊」還可引申為觸及、碰撞。《莊子‧田子方》：「若夫人者，目擊而道存矣，亦不可以容聲矣。」《戰國策‧秦策一》：「古者使車轂擊馳，言語相結，天下為一。」《史記‧蘇秦列傳》：「臨菑之塗，車轂擊，人肩摩，連衽成帷，舉袂成幕。」

擊擊RS
击击 		撃 strike, hit, beat, attack, fight
  • jostling 毄/𣪠 of the hand 手
  • modf. 擊 → 撃
  • ⓢ heavy club → 击
(Simplified: 击)
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: To strike 毄 with a hand 手; 毄 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 毄 [ jī ] to hit, to strike
    • 手 [ shǒu ] hand
①敲打，或做類似敲打的動作：擊打。擊鼓。擊中(zhòng)。擊破。擊斃。擊水(a。拍打水面；b。指游泳)。旁敲側擊。
②攻打：擊敗。擊毀。打擊。聲東擊西。
③碰，接觸：撞擊。目擊。肩摩轂擊(亦作“摩肩擊轂”)。
(Simplified: 击)
Chinese Definition:

HSK: 5
Chinese: To get to the other side of the mountain you need to beat the monsters, but you can't do it with your hands, so you equip your car with missiles.
Meaning: beat
Hanzi: 击
Story: The mountain people always beat the other towns in the annual cornstalk contest.
Kind: traditional

從「 手 」，「 毄 」聲，本義為敲打。《說文》：「攴也。从手，毄聲。」《莊子‧逍遙遊》：「鵬之徙於南冥也，水擊三千里。」韓愈〈送孟東野序〉：「金石之無聲，或擊之鳴，人之於言也亦然。」清代紀昀《閱微草堂筆記‧姑妄聽之二》：「有士人讀書僧寺，偶便旋於空院，忽有飛瓦擊其背。」 「 擊 」可引申為攻擊、攻打。《孫子‧虛實》：「兵之形，避實而擊虛。」《史記‧白起王翦列傳》：「王翦果代李信擊荊。」明代張居正〈答方金湖計服三衛屬夷書〉：「吾以三鎮全力擊其墮歸，破之必矣。」簡帛文字也見此義，如《馬王堆‧春秋事語》第79行：「宋人寡而荊人眾，及未濟，擊之，可破也。」《馬王堆．戰國縱橫家書》第297行：「以東地之兵為齊、楚為前行，出之必死，擊其不意，萬必勝。」 「 擊 」還可引申為觸及、碰撞。《莊子‧田子方》：「若夫人者，目擊而道存矣，亦不可以容聲矣。」《戰國策‧秦策一》：「古者使車轂擊馳，言語相結，天下為一。」《史記‧蘇秦列傳》：「臨菑之塗，車轂擊，人肩摩，連衽成帷，舉袂成幕。」

Suddenly there are flying tiles. Its back." " Strike" can be extended to attack and attack. "Sun Tzu‧ Imaginary Reality": "The shape of a soldier, avoiding the reality and attacking the illusion." 擊字的基本解释

擊
jī
见“击”。

擊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jī］
［《廣韻》古歷切，入錫，見。］
“1”的今字。“隔2”的被通假字。“击1”的繁体字。
(1)打；敲打。
(2)攻打；进攻。
(3)喻揭发，弹劾。
(4)杀；搏杀。
(5)触及；碰撞。
(6)掠去，除。参见“擊菒”。
(7)振翅飞翔。
(8)铁刃。
(9)古乐器名。即柷。
(10)抵触，违忤。参见“擊戾”。
(11)用同“激”。
[②]［xí］
［《集韻》刑狄切，入錫，匣。］
同“覡1”。
男巫。
[③]［jì］
［《集韻》吉詣切，去霽，見。］
人名。春秋晋有屠擊。见《左传·僖公二十八年》。

擊字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　擊； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页458第09
【唐韻】古歷切【集韻】【韻會】吉歷切，?音激。【說文】攴也。【徐曰】撲也。【廣韻】打也。【增韻】扣也。【易·蒙卦】擊蒙。【註】擊去童蒙，以發其昧。【史記·叔孫通傳】拔劒擊柱。又【酷吏傳】義縱以鷹擊毛摯爲治。　又攻殺也。【楚語】刲羊擊豕。【註】擊，殺也。【前漢·高帝紀】急擊之勿失。　又觸也。【莊子·田子方】目擊而道存矣。或作撽。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】??敵切，音檄。與覡同。男巫也。【荀子·王制篇】知其吉凶妖祥，傴巫跛擊之事也。【註】擊讀爲覡。　又【集韻】吉詣切，音訃。人名。春秋晉有屠擊。

擊字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
擊字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
hit
jī
See "strike".
hit
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jī］
["Guangyun" ancient calendar cut, enter the tin, see. ]
The present character of "1". The word "every 2" was passed. Traditional characters for "打1".
(1) Beat; beat.
(2) Offensive; offensive.
(3) Yu exposed and impeached.
(4) Kill; fight.
(5) Touch; collision.
(6) Snatch away, divide. See "Blowing".
(7) Flutter the wings and fly.
(8) Iron blade.
(9) The name of the ancient musical instrument. That is to say.
(10) Conflict, disobey. See "strikes".
(11) Use the same "excitation".
[②]［xí］
["Jiyun" Xing Diqie, enter the tin, box. ]
Same as "觋1".
wizard.
[③]［jì］
["Jiyun" Ji Yuqie, go to Ji, see. ]
Person's name. There is a massacre in the Spring and Autumn Period. See "Twenty-eight Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xi Gong".
hit
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hands and Words Department] 　打; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 458 to 09
[Tang Yun] Ancient calendar cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ji calendar cut, sound excitement. [Said the text] Ye also. [Xu Yue] Pounce too. [Guang Yun] Fight also. [Add rhyme] Deduction also. [Yi·Meng Gua] Hit Meng. [Note] Hit Tongmeng to get ignorant. 【Historical Records · Shusun Tongzhuan】Pull and strike the post. Also [The Legend of Cool Officials] Yizong uses the eagle to strike Mao Zhi as his treatment.　 Attack and kill again. [Chu language] Sheep and hog. [Note] Hit, kill. [Previous Han · Gao Di Ji] Do not miss a quick hit.　 Touch it again. [Zhuangzi·Tian Zifang] Witnessing and keeping track. Or make up.　[Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun]?? Enemy cut, sound. Same as coquettish. Wizards too. 【Xunzi·The Rule of the King】Knowing the good and bad things, the demon auspicious, the witch limp. [Note] Click to read as coquettish.　[Jiyun] Quiet cut, sound obituary. Person's name. There is a massacre in the Spring and Autumn Period.
